title: (x) Eurobait logo - Adobe Garamond {Rainer}
content:
Sorry for posting such a horrible logo.  
I need to know what the typeface is  
so I can help them make a better one

please help quickly as I don't want to  
look at itfor too much longer

thanks typos

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120502051059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Eurobait_3567.jpg)
author: Mr Brown

comments.content:
My guess is a backslanted Garamond italic in a heavier weight.  
Try for example [Adobe Garamond bold italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120502051059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-garamond/).  
And some squooshing is made, too, me thinks.

Garamond 3, maybe, squooshed. I can’t use my Garamond 3 for some reason so I can’t test it. How quickly do daft jumping zebras vex?

Edit: It looks like the small print is set with the same face.

ITC Garamond Bold Italic, backslanted and stretched, as Renko suggested:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120502051059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/euro_4927.jpg)
